availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Madison County, Kentucky, farmer. Madison County, Kentucky, native. Married to Susan Hart McDowell Irvine in Mercer County, Kentucky, in November 1821. Father of Sarah Louise Irvine White and David Irvine, Jr. Resident in Madison County, Kentucky, in 1820. Owned one enslaved person in Madison County in 1820. Resident in Madison County in 1830. Owned eight enslaved persons in Madison County in 1830. Farmer in Madison County in 1850. Owned fourteen enslaved persons in Madison County in 1850. Farmer in Madison County in 1860. Owned twenty-eight enslaved persons in Madison County in 1860.
